page.title: 07Employment in Garton
page.content: A questionnaire revealed, as expected, that the main source of employment is farming or jobs related to farming.The large, highly mechanised farms in the area employ very few people apart from the farmer and his family.For instance an arable farm of 560 acres employs only three men. The present economic difficulties in the country have had little effect as only 2 people are unemployed, i.e. among the people who answered the questionnaire. A few people are self-employed:- three builders,a joiner,a stress welder and a precision tool maker.The great majority of people are manual workers.About 12% could be described professional or white collar workers and 28% are retired.
